item.description: The July meetup will be in Newburyport MA on Sunday July 15th. Meet in front of the Maritime Museum at 25 Water Street at 11am. There are shops, historical buildings,the ocean, restaurants, etc. Be prepared to talk about what you most like to do while traveling. I hope to see you there!!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Newburyport MA Meetup
